Name: Trucker 2
About the game: King of the Road is back! Trucker 2 lets you sit once again behind the wheel of a truck and race on American highways. Player can choose order of his missions. There are nearly 60 of them. You can chose one of 5 different trucks which can be upgraded and modified in your garage. Road's surroundings are destructible, and the damage is visible on cars. Damage affects car handling. Features: 60 levels 5 different types of trucks 3 difficulty levels realistic physic based on Nvidia PhysX engine visible car damage Large, beautiful locations Tuning Varying day time and weather conditions Power-ups Traffic and police ability to use custom textures and HUD steering wheels and game pad support
